name: Biology
desc: Fund basic research in the field of biology to advance world knowledge.

name: Biology I
desc: Fund cutting edge projects in biology to advance world knowledge and begin to apply that knowledge to new technologies.

name: Biology II
desc: Fund advanced biology research to advance world knowledge and develop applicable technology.

name: Biology III
desc: Fund revolutionary biology research to advance world knowledge and develop applicable technology.

name: Biology IV
desc: Fund previously theoretical biology research to advance world knowledge and develop applicable technology.

name: Biology V
desc: Fund biology research in an attempt to push human understand to the point of theoretical mastery of the subject.
